---
name: New device or module type
about: Template to request new device or module type
title: "[New device/module]"
labels: newDevice
assignees: ''

---

## What device or module type do you want to see added?
Please name the specific manufacturer and the specifc device/module as detailed as possible (e.g. order code/name/SKU).

## Where can one find documentation for this device/module type?
Please provice publicly accessible links to manuals, datasheets, product pages, images, etc.
If no other documentation is available you may also add your own photos. Make sure to respect the relevant copyrights in these cases.
